name: I.D.K.H.2.C.T.G.
description:
I.D.K.H.2.C.T.G. -- idk how to call this game

cool 2d and 3d graohics, cool music and very cool gameplay all made by me

takes a very long time to load sounds and music, but once they're loaded it works perfectly

Controlls:
WASD/Arrows -- move
Space -- stop shooting
Enter -- upgrade

I stole various sounds from old versions of game maker, some other stolen wav files that I found on my pc + some freesound sounds:
https://freesound.org/people/soundslikewillem/sounds/190707/
https://freesound.org/people/Rudmer_Rotteveel/sounds/316920/
https://freesound.org/people/dcloh/sounds/509696/
